EmailTemplate.subject: See you this Tuesday at the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop coming up this Tuesday in San Francisco. We look forward to seeing you!
Please bring your laptop and power cord to fully participate in this hands-on workshop. A Mac or Linux environment is ideal. For the best workshop experience, please prep your laptop prior to attending following the “Workshop Prerequisites” listed below.
Pivotal Cloud Platform Workshop Tuesday, October 7, 2014 8:00am - 5:30pm (breakfast & lunch provided) Workshop Agenda <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/sf>
InterContinental Hotel 888 Howard Street InterContinental Ballroom, Fifth Floor San Francisco, CA 60605 Map and Driving Directions
Parking Options Valet parking available at the InterContinental for $35 for workshop attendees Fifth & Mission Garage: 833 Mission St. (between Fourth & Fifth Streets) Hearst Parking Center <http://parking.hearstbuildingsf.com/>: 45 Third Street (entrance on Stevenson, 2 blocks from Moscone South/North) Moscone Center Garage <http://www.sfmta.com/getting-around/parking/parking-garages/moscone-center-garage>: 255 Third Street (Folsom & Howard)
Walking Directions from BART From the Powell BART Station, exit at 5th Street, and walk toward Howard.
WORKSHOP PREREQUISITES All Hands-on Sections
- Git <http://git-scm.com/downloads> ("brew install git") - A GitHub <https://github.com> account - Your favorite Java editor (Eclipse, IntelliJ IDEA, Netbeans)
- The Cloud Foundry CLI <https://github.com/cloudfoundry/cli/releases> - download the latest!
- A FREE account on Pivotal Web Services - create a 60-day trial with no credit card at https://run.pivotal.io
Questions? Contact Lisa Vieira at lvieira@pivotal.io <mailto:lvieira@pivotal.io> or via cell at 650-823-1909 <tel:650-823-1909>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
